Posts.Content: Thank you to everyone who replied to my concerns about chemo side effects. I am new on here and it feel a good to share with people who understand. Thanks for all the helpful advice. D x
Posts.Title: Chemotherapy side effects

Posts.Content: Is anyone else on here suffering from chemo side effects? I am on FEC-T Before my diagnosis I was very fit, healthy and active.  Now I have virtually turned into a "couch potato"  I have never been so inactive and finding it very difficult.  For the first 10 days after chemo I am so nauseated that eating and drinking is very difficult.  Then there is the tiredness.. Surely I am not the only one going through this?
Posts.Title: Chemotherapy side effects
